actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on District of Columbia.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Fiscal Affairs and Health.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fiscal Affairs and Health

official_title: To amend the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Relations Act to permit the District of Columbia to impose a tax on income earned by individuals who reside outside of the District.
short_title: District of Columbia Fiscal Fairness Act of 1991

summary.text: District of Columbia Fiscal Fairness Act of 1991 - Amends the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Relations Act to permit the Council of the District of Columbia to impose personal income taxes on nonresidents.

titles.title: District of Columbia Fiscal Fairness Act of 1991
To amend the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Relations Act to permit the District of Columbia to impose a tax on income earned by individuals who reside outside of the District.
